messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

pc running extremely slow after update from last thursday pc running extremely slow after update last thursday hello last thursday installed some updates come center if remember correctly after update pc became very slow app start up changed drastically was given pc few weeks ago everything started up instantly everything seems think very hard before starting even browsing takes about open single usage show bottleneck please advise solution regards
